name: The Tardis Defender
description:
ENGLISH : The doctor went to look for Clara, in his absence he entrusts you the mission to protect his TARDIS. With the help of a tank he will have to protect him against the Cyber-mens and Daleks wanting to capture the TARDIS.

Français : Le doctor est partie chercher Clara , en son absence il te confie la mission de protéger son TARDIS .A l'aide d'un tank il va devoir le protéger face au Cyber-mens et Daleks voulant capturer le TARDIS.
